actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making an additional appropriation for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, for the Department of Health Education, and Welfare for research on the cause and treatment of diabetes.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Provides an additional appropriation of $25,000,000 for fiscal year 1975, for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for research on the cause and treatment of diabetes.

titles.title: A bill making an additional appropriation for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, for the Department of Health Education, and Welfare for research on the cause and treatment of diabetes.
